QuestData.Title: Maywiki
QuestData.Description: <Linzi looks troubled.>$b$bYou know, there's a troll hiding behind that pile of boxes. She must be awfully sad, if she doesn't want to come out and talk to anyone.$b$b<Linzi places some of the Akiris reeds in a kerchief and ties it together.>$b$bHere, give these to her. They're very soft, and that maybe they will make her feel a little more comfortable back there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Linzi's Gift to Maywiki of Zuldazar at the Explorers' League Digsite.
QuestData.RewardText: <The troll looks into the package.>$b$bYou have my thanks. You may tell your young dwarven $g friend: girlfriend; that I am not sad. I am waiting. For you.$b$bI have identified you as the most promising $r here in this strange town. I have a task for you, if you would be willing to take it.
